summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4564 for the improvement of 4th Avenue South, from Spokane Street to Duwamish Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by filling, graveling and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 53295, and levying and assessment the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
